item.title: Here's how the U.S. Open's signature Honey Deuce cocktail price stacks up against inflation
item.description: CNBC compared the Honey Deuce's price growth since 2015 against the CPI basket.

item.title: Core inflation rose to 2.9% in July, highest since February
item.description: The PCE report today was expected to show core inflation at 2.9% and headline inflation at 2.6%.

item.title: Higher inflation and unemployment cast shadow over Europe's biggest economy
item.description: A hotter-than-expected inflation reading for Germany came on the same day that figures showed unemployed jumped in August.

item.title: Denmark slashes 2025 growth forecast amid Novo Nordisk slowdown
item.description: Denmark on Friday cut its annual growth forecast to 1.4% from 3%.

item.title: U.S. economy expanded 3.3% in Q2, with growth even stronger than initially thought
item.description: Consumer spending, which rose by 1.6% compared with an initial 1.4% estimate, helped push the number higher.
